sentences.en: Chandra was determined to become a doctor and her persistence paid off.
sentences.cn: 钱德拉决心做一名医生，她的坚持不懈得到了回报。

sentences.en: Creative people are usually very determined and thrive on overcoming obstacles.
sentences.cn: 富有创造力的人一般都意志非常坚定，能不断克服困难，事业蒸蒸日上。

sentences.en: Gwen is a very determined woman.
sentences.cn: 格温是个意志很坚定的女性。

sentences.en: He is determined to see the Act enforced more stringently.
sentences.cn: 他决意要确保该法令得到更加严格的执行。

sentences.en: I am determined to build on this solid foundation.
sentences.cn: 我决定在这个坚实的基础之上继续努力。

sentences.en: I was determined not to succumb to the virus.
Jane is determined to hold on to her fortune.
sentences.cn: 简决心要守住自己的财产。

sentences.en: Sandra was determined to become a doctor and her persistence paid off.
sentences.cn: 桑德拉决心成为医生，她的坚持取得了成功。

sentences.en: Science has determined that the risk is very small.
sentences.cn: 科学已经探明其危险性非常小。

sentences.en: She gave him a bright, determined smile which seemed unnatural.
sentences.cn: 她对他开朗、坚定地一笑，但笑得有点不自然。

sentences.en: She was determined not to let the illness take hold again.
sentences.cn: 她决心不让疾病再次击垮自己。

sentences.en: The Bank of England seems determined to wind up the company.
sentences.cn: 英格兰银行似乎决心要关闭这家公司。

sentences.en: The identities of the deceased have now been determined.
sentences.cn: 死者的身份现在已经确定。

sentences.en: The President is determined "to go the extra mile for peace".
sentences.cn: 总统决心“为实现和平而加倍努力”。

sentences.en: The Queen was determined to show it was business as usual.
sentences.cn: 女王决定表现出一切正常的样子。

sentences.en: These companies are determined to keep a stranglehold on the banana industry.
sentences.cn: 这些公司决心要垄断香蕉业。

words.tran_cn: 决定因素；[数] 行列式

trans.tran_en: having a strong desire to do something, so that you will not let anyone stop you
